Learn about the 10 best foods for health: Learn about the 10 best foods for healthy eating. Include them in your diet to maintain health and energy.
healthy eating, healthy foods, top 10 fo: healthy eating, healthy foods, top 10 foods, nutrition
Avocado is rich in healthy fats, vitamin: Avocado is rich in healthy fats, vitamins, and antioxidants. It helps maintain cardiovascular health and lowers cholesterol levels.
This type of fish is a source of omega-3: This type of fish is a source of omega-3 fatty acids that support brain, heart, and skin health.
Blueberries, raspberries, and strawberri: Blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries are superfoods rich in antioxidants that strengthen the immune system and promote skin health.
Almonds, walnuts, cashews are sources of: Almonds, walnuts, cashews are sources of protein, healthy fats, and minerals that provide energy.
Oats, buckwheat, quinoa are sources of c: Oats, buckwheat, quinoa are sources of complex carbohydrates and fiber that support digestion and provide long-lasting satiety.
Spinach is a source of iron, vitamin K,: Spinach is a source of iron, vitamin K, and antioxidants. It helps maintain energy and supports bone health.
Natural yogurt is rich in probiotics tha: Natural yogurt is rich in probiotics that support gut health and improve digestion.
Chicken breast is a source of high-quali: Chicken breast is a source of high-quality protein essential for muscle recovery and energy maintenance.
Eggs are a versatile product rich in pro: Eggs are a versatile product rich in protein, vitamins, and healthy fats that provide energy.
Sweet potatoes contain complex carbohydr: Sweet potatoes contain complex carbohydrates, fiber, and B vitamins that support energy and digestive health.
Including these foods in your diet will: Including these foods in your diet will help maintain health, energy, and physical fitness. Use the

Learn why water is a key factor in the w: Learn why water is a key factor in the weight loss process. From boosting metabolism to controlling appetite — all about the benefits of water.
water for weight loss, benefits of water: water for weight loss, benefits of water, weight loss, hydration
Studies have shown that drinking 500 ml: Studies have shown that drinking 500 ml of water can increase the metabolic rate by 24-30% over the next few hours. This helps the body burn calories more efficiently.
Often, the body confuses hunger with thi: Often, the body confuses hunger with thirst. Drinking a glass of water before meals can reduce calorie intake and help better control your appetite.
Dehydration can lead to fatigue and redu: Dehydration can lead to fatigue and reduced performance. Proper hydration helps maintain energy and activity, which is important for physical training and daily activities.
Drinking water promotes better digestion: Drinking water promotes better digestion, prevents constipation, and supports normal gastrointestinal function. This is essential for healthy weight loss.
Water helps cleanse the body of toxins t: Water helps cleanse the body of toxins that can accumulate due to poor nutrition or insufficient physical activity. This keeps your body in optimal shape.
How Much Water Should You Drink?: How Much Water Should You Drink?
The recommended norm for an adult is abo: The recommended norm for an adult is about 1.5-2 liters of water per day. However, this amount may vary depending on activity level, climate, and individual needs.

Water helps maintain metabolism, cleanse: Water helps maintain metabolism, cleanse the body, and reduce hunger. Try to drink 1.5-2 liters of water per day.
Regular physical activity helps not only: Regular physical activity helps not only burn calories but also maintain muscle mass. Even daily 30-minute walks will yield results.

What are Calories and Why Are They Impor: What are Calories and Why Are They Important?
Calories are a unit of energy obtained f: Calories are a unit of energy obtained from food and drinks. Your body uses calories to maintain vital functions: breathing, heart activity, movement, and even thinking.
When you consume more calories than you: When you consume more calories than you burn, the excess is stored as fat. Conversely, burning more than you consume leads to weight loss.
How to Determine Your Calorie Norm?: How to Determine Your Calorie Norm?
Multiply BMR by your activity level:: Multiply BMR by your activity level:
This number is your Total Daily Energy E: This number is your Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE). To lose weight, create a deficit of 10-20% from TDEE.

Avoid ultra-processed foods with \"empty: Avoid ultra-processed foods with "empty" calories: chips, sweets, soft drinks.

Learn about the Ukrainian app Calorize,: Learn about the Ukrainian app Calorize, its founders, and mission. A simple and convenient tool for calorie control.
about us, Calorize, Lialia Sakhno, Ulian: about us, Calorize, Lialia Sakhno, Uliana Sakhno, calorie control, Ukrainian product
Calorize was born out of a real need. Se: Calorize was born out of a real need. Seven years ago, I, Lialia Sakhno, decided to lose weight and started searching for the perfect app that met all my requirements: simplicity, scientific accuracy, precision, and no unnecessary features. Unfortunately, I couldn’t find such a tool. All existing apps were either too gamified or lacked precise calculations for custom recipes, including adjustments for evaporation or moisture loss during cooking.
That’s why I decided to create my own ap: That’s why I decided to create my own app with a focus on convenience, functionality, and minimalism. Calorize is the result of my years of programming experience and my desire to help others achieve their healthy eating goals.
I am Lialia Sakhno, an experienced Larav: I am Lialia Sakhno, an experienced Laravel developer with many years of expertise in working on complex projects. In this project, I am responsible for all the code, from the backend to the design. Since I specialize more in backend development, creating the design was a challenge for me, but I thoroughly enjoyed overcoming it.
My girlfriend, Uliana Sakhno, helps me t: My girlfriend, Uliana Sakhno, helps me test the app and find ways to make it even better. Together, we aim to create a product that becomes a reliable assistant for everyone who has chosen the path to a healthy lifestyle.
We believe that everyone deserves a conv: We believe that everyone deserves a convenient and accurate tool to monitor their diet. Our mission is to help people become healthier and achieve their dietary goals without unnecessary complications.
Simplicity, minimalism, precision, and s: Simplicity, minimalism, precision, and scientific approach are the core values we instill in Calorize.
Accurate calculations of calories, prote: Accurate calculations of calories, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates
Unique feature to create custom recipes: Unique feature to create custom recipes considering the cooking method
Tools to track progress and achieve goal: Tools to track progress and achieve goals
In the future, we plan to add new featur: In the future, we plan to add new features such as a barcode scanner for easy product addition, AI-powered tools for creating personalized meal plans, and an expanded product database.
We believe that together with you, we ca: We believe that together with you, we can create a healthy and inspiring future for everyone.
Learn how Calorize ensures the security: Learn how Calorize ensures the security and privacy of your data. Get acquainted with our privacy policy.
privacy policy, Calorize, data protectio: privacy policy, Calorize, data protection, confidentiality
We, the Calorize team, are committed to: We, the Calorize team, are committed to ensuring the confidentiality of your data. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information.
your name, email address, date of birth.
entries in the calorie diary, selected p: entries in the calorie diary, selected products, recipes, etc.

How do we use your data?: How do we use your data?
To ensure the correct operation of the a: To ensure the correct operation of the app and its features.
To analyze and improve the service.
To communicate with you regarding update: To communicate with you regarding updates or important information.
How do we protect your data?: How do we protect your data?
Your data is protected using modern encr: Your data is protected using modern encryption methods and security protocols. Only authorized personnel have access to your data, and solely for the purposes of completing necessary tasks.
Do we share your data with third parties: Do we share your data with third parties?
We do not share your personal data with: We do not share your personal data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
You have the right to know what data we: You have the right to know what data we collect and how we use it.
You can request the deletion or updating: You can request the deletion or updating of your data.
You can withdraw your consent for data p: You can withdraw your consent for data processing at any time.
If you have questions about this privacy: If you have questions about this privacy policy or your data, contact us at:
We may update this privacy policy from t: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes through our app or via email.
Calorize — AI Food Diary & Calorie Track: Calorize — AI Food Diary & Calorie Tracker
Calorize is an AI-powered food diary and: Calorize is an AI-powered food diary and calorie tracker. Log meals by chat or voice, pick the right product variant from your history, track calories & macros, and use an 85,000+ Ukrainian product database.
AI calorie tracker, AI food diary, calor: AI calorie tracker, AI food diary, calorie diary, macro tracker, calorie counting app, nutrition tracker, Ukrainian product database, recipes, weight loss
The AI logs it — with calories and macro: The AI logs it — with calories and macros.
Calorize finds the right product (includ: Calorize finds the right product (including your usual variant), chooses a sensible portion, and adds it to the correct meal.
Text or voice → saved to diary: Text or voice → saved to diary
Uses your recent entries to disambiguate: Uses your recent entries to disambiguate
Why Calorize? Simple, fast, and powered: Why Calorize? Simple, fast, and powered by AI
Most calorie apps fail because logging i: Most calorie apps fail because logging is tedious. Calorize flips it: you describe your food in a message, the AI understands it, finds the right product, and updates your diary. You stay consistent — results follow.
Add, edit, delete, or copy meals by chat: Add, edit, delete, or copy meals by chat. Short messages work, and recent history helps pick the right variant — but your words always win (e.g. “lean”).
Search fast, pick exact matches, and sto: Search fast, pick exact matches, and stop guessing. Great for branded foods, supermarket products, and everyday staples.
Build your recipes from ingredients (eve: Build your recipes from ingredients (even other recipes), keep nutrition per 100g, and let Calorize handle the calculations for calories and macros.
Track calories, proteins, fats, and carb: Track calories, proteins, fats, and carbs. See trends, stay on target, and adjust based on real data — not vibes.
Built with the heart of an engineer — an: Built with the heart of an engineer — and a daily user
Calorize was created by a person who tra: Calorize was created by a person who tracks food every day and continuously uses the product. The goal is simple: make calorie and macro tracking so effortless that you can stay consistent for months — not days.
The AI assistant reduces taps and choice: The AI assistant reduces taps and choices — you just describe what you ate.
Fast search, recipes, copy meals, edits,: Fast search, recipes, copy meals, edits, and a huge Ukrainian database — built for real-life use.
We keep iterating based on real daily us: We keep iterating based on real daily use — so the app stays simple, fast, and useful.
How the AI calorie diary works: How the AI calorie diary works
Calorize is a functional calorie countin: Calorize is a functional calorie counting app with an AI assistant. It understands natural language, finds products, and updates your diary with calories and macros.
“a bowl of borscht”, “200g chicken”, “co: “a bowl of borscht”, “200g chicken”, “coffee with milk”
Uses search + your recent diary to pick: Uses search + your recent diary to pick the most likely variant, and asks only when needed.
Saved to the correct meal with grams and: Saved to the correct meal with grams and macros. Edit later by message.
Calorize keeps it simple: quick logging,: Calorize keeps it simple: quick logging, accurate nutrition, and an AI assistant that helps you stay consistent. Create your account and try it today.
People stick with Calorize because it’s: People stick with Calorize because it’s fast: the AI assistant removes the friction of daily logging.
“I finally log food consistently. I just: “I finally log food consistently. I just message what I ate, and the AI adds it to my diary. Tracking feels effortless.”
“The product database is huge, but the A: “The product database is huge, but the AI makes it simple. I track calories and macros without spending my day in the app.”
